body_html:
Fair enough. For what it's worth, I did try Google/SO/Forums first. It did seem odd, though, that this never appeared for me before the recent update and immediately after occurred on two consecutive runs. It's also not occurring now after I've commented out my LayerNorm layers. Again though, I looked through that (your?) code for that layer and there seems to be no relationship to the error--just an odd coincidence.

Thanks for the quick reply.

body:
Fair enough. For what it's worth, I did try Google/SO/Forums first. It did seem odd, though, that this never appeared for me before the recent update and immediately after occurred on two consecutive runs. It's also not occurring now after I've commented out my LayerNorm layers. Again though, I looked through that (your?) code for that layer and there seems to be no relationship to the error--just an odd coincidence.

Thanks for the quick reply.
